roadroller.gameobject
Class SpriteObject

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.game.Layer
      javax.microedition.lcdui.game.Sprite
          roadroller.gameobject.SpriteObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, BloodSplatter, Car, FuelDrain, FuelUp, Granny, PlayerObject, SlowDown, SpeedUp
public abstract class SpriteObject
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.game.Sprite
implements GameObject

A object using a Sprite used to construct any visible gameobjects except the background.

Author:
Felix

Constructor Detail

SpriteObject

public SpriteObject(java.lang.String spriteFile,
                    int frameWidth,
                    int frameHeight,
                    int[] frameSequence,
                    int xReference,
                    int yReference,
                    int xPos,
                    int yPos)
             throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new Sprite-GameObject

Parameters:
spriteFile - location of Image-file
frameWidth - the sprites framewitdth
frameHeight - the sprites frameheight
frameSequence - array containing the frame sequence
xReference - x- reference for sprite placement
yReference - y- reference for sprite placement
xPos - the x position depending on reference (actual Sprite is placed on canvas position [xPos - xReference, yPos - yReference])
yPos - the y position depending on reference (actual Sprite is placed on canvas position [xPos - xReference, yPos - yReference])
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if file not readable

Creates a new Sprite-GameObject

Parameters:
img - Image Object
frameWidth - the sprites framewitdth
frameHeight - the sprites frameheight
frameSequence - array containing the frame sequence
xReference - x- reference for sprite placement
yReference - y- reference for sprite placement
xPos - the x position depending on reference (actual Sprite is placed on canvas position [xPos - xReference, yPos - yReference])
yPos - the y position depending on reference (actual Sprite is placed on canvas position [xPos - xReference, yPos - yReference])
Throws:
